alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 17 at 3:27PM MST until June 17 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 430 PM MST. * At 326 PM MST, a wall of dust near San Simon was moving west around 10 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 372 and 385. Locations impacted include... San Simon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
